Yesterday
Hey - I know we're all busy today. I wanted to re-emphasize a few things and also see if we
could strategize for what's next.
First, I understand you have to make hard decisions. I know you have limited resources. Here
are my recent issues that are still outstanding:
1) Royal Farms going to Pivotal. I was told this was in the works. Have we dropped? I understand
if that's the case, but can't you at least try to leverage this as a win for either a new client OR a case
study?
2) Johnny Rockets. We all know this was a mess. They didn't do hosted gateway and did
integration. This project took so long that I lost any goodwill I had with that chain. I have 6-8 other
franchise groups I am not going to go after until I know they won't have to go through this again.
3) Focus POS. They are taking Focus POS merchants that are boarded with you and moving
them elsewhere because they have new product. We can't stop them. However, now the client is
suffering because their fees are going up. It would be nice if you would not penalize the client, but
I know that is wishful thinking.
4) I am not going to say I told you so about 4P/Shift4. However, that partnership is costing us now.
They are taking business and there isn't anything we can do about it since you are relying on your
former competitor to provide service to you.
5) I am not getting paid. I have received a letter from your CFO essentially telling me too bad, you
won't get paid. Well, I did my job and was an important factor in getting those accounts. I am owed
that money.
We have been together for 14 years now. I thought that meant something. I need help here.
I get it. So, what am I doing wrong? How can I make this relationship bette

8:22 AM ffl Messages J. Rickert Details
Yesterday
Hey - I know we're all busy today. I wanted to re-emphasize a few things and also see if we
could strategize for what's next.
First, I understand you have to make hard decisions. I know you have limited resources. Here
are my recent issues that are still outstanding:
1) Royal Farms going to Pivotal. I was told this was in the works. Have we dropped? I understand
if that's case, but can't you at least try to leverage this as a win for either a new client OR a case
study?
2) Johnny Rockets. We all know this was a mess. They didn't do hosted gateway and did
integration. This project took so long that I lost any goodwill I had with that chain. I have 6-8 other
franchise groups I am not going to go after until I know they won't have to go through this again.
3) Focus POS. They are taking Focus POS merchants that are boarded with you and moving
them elsewhere because they have new product. We can't stop them. However, now the client is
suffering because their fees are going up. It would be nice if you would not penalize the client, but
I know is wishful thinking.
4) I am not going to say I told you so about 4P/Shift4. However, that partnership is costing us now.
They are taking business and there isn't anything we can do about it since you are relying on your
former competitor to provide service to you.
5) I am not getting paid. I have received a letter from your CFO essentially telling me too bad, you
won't get paid. Well, I did my job and was an important factor in getting those accounts. I am owed
money.
We have been together for 14 years now. I thought that meant something. I need help here.
I get it. So, what am I doing wrong? How can I make this relationship bette
